location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from Colonel William Earle to Colonel Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter informing Pelly that he had not been mentioned in the Bhurtpore [Bharatpur] programme as it had been assumed he would be accompanying the Viceroy throughout the day and informing him of someone else who had been omitted and requesting that Captain Arthur William Roberts be informed of the omission.
